name: Turtle Race
description:
A Rhythm & Rage game about a turtle escaping his former home.

SPACE/LBM = Go up

ENTER/RBM = Dodge obstacle

This game is an abandoned project that I decided to upload anyways due to the amount of work put into it. Menu navigation and the third level are incomplete, but if there is any interest in the continuation of this project I will update it.

This game is a rage game and it's intended to be a difficult experience. If you plan on completing the game, take your time and relax. This game takes some time for everyone. You got this.

Music:

EpicBattle by PeriTune

Crawling by White Bat Audio
